TT_SERVICE_USAGE_PROCEDURE: Please check the video below for the procedure to use the stera ads service!
TT_TERMS_OF_USE_CONTENT:
Please read and agree to the following terms of use until the end.

stera ads Terms of Service
Before using the stera ads service provided by Sumitomo Mitsui Card Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "the Company"), it is necessary to read the entire text of this agreement and then agree to this agreement, and the contents of this agreement. If is changed, you need to agree to the changed terms.

Article 1 (Definition)
The following terms used in this agreement shall have the meanings set forth below.
(1) "App" means Android application software (including but not limited to text, images, videos and other data) distributed by the developer to the terminal using this service.
(2) "Terminal" means the terminal specified by us that is the target of distribution of the application.
